snippet: All three major indexes declined after stock price fell for consumer-focused companies like Amazon.com in the wake of a less than stellar start to the holiday shopping season.
abstract: Stocks fall, dragged lower by Detroit automakers and some consumer-focused companies.
lead_paragraph: All three major indexes declined after stock price fell for consumer-focused companies like Amazon.com in the wake of a less than stellar start to the holiday shopping season.

headline.main: Shares Slide, Suggesting the Yearlong Rally Is Cresting
headline.print_headline: Shares Slide, Suggesting the Yearlong Rally Is Cresting
